on monetizing the network

with generative AI and 5G
anywhere capabilities of AWS.
We are trying to help telcos monetize
from their huge investments.

capabilities gave birth

the billion dollar ideas.
However, for 5G, we are still waiting
for that killer use case.

That's why AWS with its

a 5G network quickly

So how do we do that?

you have infrastructure

in a private environment

So the three things that developers need

to invent those kind of killer
use cases are an ability
to create a 5G network,

and have ability to access
the telecom network,

and also have the tools
to actually use them.

So if I'm a developer and

Because telcos can't expose the data,

An ecosystem where we have

We provide them with Bedrock,
